attributes.action: Ban MPs from having outside jobs and directorships.
attributes.background: MPs spend too long on their outside jobs and directorships instead of the job for which they were elected.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about MPs having other jobs, but we aren't sure exactly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In particular we are not sure what you mean by "outside jobs" and whether your proposed ban would cover all other forms of employment, including ministerial posts and unpaid roles.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see.
